about_the_game:
TRS19 version of Midwestern Branch is here!
The route has gone through an overhaul from TANE to TRS19 standards, with new track, textures, and a few other adjustments. Previous purchasers can upgrade to the TRS19 for free!

Original description of the DLC:
CHALLENGING, FUN & AFFORDABLE - A ROUTE FOR EVERYONE

Midwestern Branch is primarily a industrial route based upon freight operations in the breadbasket region of the USA.

While the main line is owned and operated by BNSF, the branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.

So what are you waiting for? There’s work that has to be done on the line. Good luck and have a safe trip!

Includes 5 sessions with detailed gameplay:

Grain Collector
Lumber Mill Duties
Mill Town Switching
Night of the Twister
Transfer Run


Route and sessions created by Hiawathamr and priced to ensure great value for every Trainz fan.

Note: If you already own this DLC pack, you will receive this update automatically.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Midwestern Branch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Midwestern Branch is a fictional route based somewhere in the Midwestern section of the US. This branch line uses ex-Milwaukee Road units in both SD40-2 and GP38-2 styles to help serve the industries that are in the towns of Littleport, Levitt, Cylinder, and Mill Town.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
